Class PauseMenuController

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
controller.PauseMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class PauseMenuController extends Observable implements KeyListener
controller of the pause menu, helps to process the pause menu navigation and coordinates the TitleScreenView and GameView.

    • PauseMenuController

      public PauseMenuController(JFrame window, PauseMenuView pauseMenuView, GameView gameView, GameController gameController)
      controller, helps out processing the user keyboard inputs when he is in the pause menu. PauseMenuView.
      Parameters:
      window - JFrame created in Main
      pauseMenuView - PauseMenuView view
      gameView - GameView view
      gameController - GameController controller

  • Method Details

    • keyTyped

      public void keyTyped(KeyEvent e)
      Specified by:
      keyTyped in interface KeyListener

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e)
      processes the user key presses when in the pause menu. the user can press the up arrow key to navigate up, down arrow key to navigate down, and the enter key to select and confirm the selected option. notifies AudioManager to play the menu sounds.
      Specified by:
      keyPressed in interface KeyListener
      Parameters:
      e - the event to be processed

    • keyReleased

      public void keyReleased(KeyEvent e)
      Specified by:
      keyReleased in interface KeyListener

    • handleEnterInput

      private void handleEnterInput()
      handles the currently selected option logic. 1. if it is 'resume', then the pause menu will be set to not be visible, and game controller state will be set to 'playing', and all models will resume to update. GameController, GameController.GameState. 2. if it is 'to the main menu', then the content pane will get cleared and the used will be brought to the title screen. TitleScreenView, TitleScreenController.
